imgs.text: Royal Cape One-Design photo on sailboatdata.com
Royal Cape One-Design drawing on sailboatdata.com

name: ROYAL CAPE ONE-DESIGN (RCOD)
notes: First designed for single chined plywood contruction. Based on the ZEESLANG ('Sea Snake' vds #58 - 1956).  A round-bilged version was later built of fiberglass. Built, and seen mostly in South Africa. It is what we would today call an ULBD and decades ahead of it's time.
